001package fr.univavignon.pokedex.api;
002
003/**
004 * Factory interface for class that aims to create Pokemon instance.
005 * 
006 * @author fv
007 */
008public interface IPokemonFactory {
009
010        /**
011         * Creates a pokemon instance computing it IVs.
012         * 
013         * @param index Pokemon index.
014         * @param cp Pokemon CP.
015         * @param hp Pokemon HP.
016         * @param dust Required dust for upgrading pokemon.
017         * @param candy Required candy for upgrading pokemon.
018         * @return Created pokemon instance.
019         */
020        Pokemon createPokemon(int index, int cp, int hp, int dust, int candy) throws PokedexException;
021        
022}
